verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will have <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and again <S%H5750><s%> choose <S%H977><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and settle <S%H5117><s%> them in their own land, <S%H127><s%> then strangers <S%H1616><s%> will join <S%H3867><s%> them and attach <S%H5596><s%> themselves to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> will take <S%H3947><s%> them along and bring <S%H935><s%> them to their place, <S%H4725><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will possess <S%H5157><s%> them as an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> as male <S%H5650><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%>; <S%H8198><s%> and they will take <S%H1961><s%> their captors <S%H7617><s%> captive, <S%H7617><s%> and will rule <S%H7287><s%> over their oppressors. <S%H5065><s%>

And it will be in the day <S%H3117><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H5117><s%> you rest <S%H5117><s%> from your pain <S%H6090><s%> and turmoil <S%H7267><s%> and harsh <S%H7186><s%> service <S%H5656><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you have been enslaved, <S%H5647><s%>

that you will take <S%H5375><s%> up this <S%H2088><s%> taunt <S%H4912><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "How <S%H349><s%> the oppressor <S%H5065><s%> has ceased, <S%H7673><s%> [And how] fury <S%H9293><s%> has ceased! <S%H7673><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has broken <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> The scepter <S%H7626><s%> of rulers <S%H4910><s%>

Which used to strike <S%H5221><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in fury <S%H5678><s%> with unceasing <S%H1115><s%> <S%H5627><s%> strokes, <S%H4347><s%> Which subdued <S%H7287><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%> with unrestrained <S%H2820><s%> <S%H1097><s%> persecution. <S%H4783><s%>
"The whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> is at rest <S%H5117><s%> [and] is quiet; <S%H8252><s%> They break <S%H6476><s%> forth <S%H6476><s%> into shouts <S%H7440><s%> of joy. <S%H7440><s%>

"Even <S%H1571><s%> the cypress <S%H1265><s%> trees <S%H1265><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over you, [and] the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> [saying,] 'Since <S%H9241><s%> you were laid <S%H7901><s%> low, <S%H7901><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> [tree] cutter <S%H3772><s%> comes <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> us.'

"Sheol <S%H7585><s%> from beneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> is excited <S%H7264><s%> over you to meet <S%H7122><s%> you when you come; <S%H935><s%> It arouses <S%H5782><s%> for you the spirits <S%H7496><s%> of the dead, <S%H7496><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H6260><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> It raises <S%H6965><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> from their thrones. <S%H3678><s%>

"They will all <S%H3605><s%> respond <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to you, 'Even <S%H1571><s%> you have been made <S%H2470><s%> weak <S%H2470><s%> as we, You have become <S%H4911><s%> like <S%H4911><s%> us.

'Your pomp <S%H1347><s%> [and] the music <S%H1998><s%> of your harps <S%H5035><s%> Have been brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> Maggots <S%H7415><s%> are spread <S%H3331><s%> out [as your bed] beneath <S%H8478><s%> you, And worms <S%H9641><s%> are your covering. <S%H4374><s%>'

"How <S%H349><s%> you have fallen <S%H5307><s%> from heaven, <S%H4605><s%> O star <S%H1966><s%> of the morning, <S%H1966><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of the dawn! <S%H7837><s%> You have been cut <S%H1438><s%> down <S%H1438><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> You who have weakened <S%H2522><s%> the nations! <S%H1471><s%>

"But you said <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> 'I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> to heaven; <S%H4605><s%> I will raise <S%H7311><s%> my throne <S%H3678><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> of God, <S%H410><s%> And I will sit <S%H3427><s%> on the mount <S%H2022><s%> of assembly <S%H4150><s%> In the recesses <S%H3411><s%> of the north. <S%H6828><s%>
'I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heights <S%H1116><s%> of the clouds; <S%H5645><s%> I will make <S%H1819><s%> myself like <S%H1819><s%> the Most <S%H9411><s%> High. <S%H9411><s%>'
"Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> you will be thrust <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> To the recesses <S%H3411><s%> of the pit. <S%H953><s%>

"Those who see <S%H7200><s%> you will gaze <S%H7688><s%> at you, They will ponder <S%H995><s%> over <S%H413><s%> you, [saying,] 'Is this <S%H2088><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> who made the earth <S%H776><s%> tremble, <S%H7264><s%> Who shook <S%H7493><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%>

Who made <S%H7760><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> like a wilderness <S%H4057><s%> And overthrew <S%H2040><s%> its cities, <S%H5892><s%> Who did not allow <S%H6605><s%> his prisoners <S%H615><s%> to [go] home <S%H1004><s%>?'
"All <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> in glory, <S%H9202><s%> Each <S%H376><s%> in his own tomb. <S%H1004><s%>

"But you have been cast <S%H7993><s%> out of your tomb <S%H6913><s%> Like a rejected <S%H8581><s%> branch, <S%H5342><s%> Clothed <S%H3830><s%> with the slain <S%H2026><s%> who are pierced <S%H2944><s%> with a sword, <S%H2719><s%> Who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the stones <S%H68><s%> of the pit, <S%H953><s%> Like a trampled <S%H947><s%> corpse. <S%H6297><s%>

"You will not be united <S%H3161><s%> with them in burial, <S%H6900><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> you have ruined <S%H7843><s%> your country, <S%H776><s%> You have slain <S%H2026><s%> your people. <S%H5971><s%> May the offspring <S%H2233><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%> not be mentioned <S%H7121><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

"Prepare <S%H3559><s%> for his sons <S%H1121><s%> a place <S%H4293><s%> of slaughter <S%H4293><s%> Because of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers. They must not arise <S%H1><s%> and take <S%H6965><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the earth <S%H3423><s%> And fill <S%H776><s%> the face <S%H4390><s%> of the world <S%H6440><s%> with cities. <S%H8398><s%>"

"And I will rise <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> them," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "and will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> and survivors, <S%H7605><s%> offspring <S%H5209><s%> and posterity, <S%H5220><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"I will also make <S%H7760><s%> it a possession <S%H4180><s%> for the hedgehog, <S%H7090><s%> and swamps <S%H98><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and I will sweep <S%H2894><s%> it with the broom <S%H4292><s%> of destruction, <S%H8045><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Surely, <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as I have intended <S%H1819><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> it has happened, <S%H1961><s%> and just <S%H9201><s%> as I have planned <S%H3289><s%> so it will stand, <S%H6965><s%>

to break <S%H7665><s%> Assyria <S%H804><s%> in My land, <S%H776><s%> and I will trample <S%H947><s%> him on My mountains. <S%H2022><s%> Then his yoke <S%H5923><s%> will be removed <S%H5493><s%> from them, and his burden <S%H5448><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> from their shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

"This <S%H384><s%> is the plan <S%H6098><s%> devised <S%H3289><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth; <S%H776><s%> and this <S%H384><s%> is the hand <S%H3027><s%> that is stretched <S%H5186><s%> out against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has planned, <S%H3289><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> can frustrate <S%H6565><s%> [it]? And as for His stretched-out hand, <S%H3027><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can turn <S%H7725><s%> it back <S%H7725><s%>?"
In the year <S%H8141><s%> that King <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%> died <S%H4194><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> oracle <S%H9294><s%> came: <S%H1961><s%>

"Do not rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> O Philistia, <S%H6429><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you, Because <S%H3588><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> that struck <S%H5221><s%> you is broken; <S%H7665><s%> For from the serpent <S%H8314><s%>'s root <S%H8328><s%> a viper <S%H6848><s%> will come <S%H3318><s%> out, And its fruit <S%H6529><s%> will be a flying <S%H5774><s%> serpent.

"And those who are most <S%H1060><s%> helpless <S%H1800><s%> will eat, <S%H7462><s%> And the needy <S%H34><s%> will lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> in security; <S%H983><s%> I will destroy <S%H4191><s%> your root <S%H8328><s%> with famine, <S%H7458><s%> And it will kill <S%H2026><s%> off your survivors. <S%H7611><s%>

"Wail, <S%H3213><s%> O gate; <S%H8179><s%> cry, <S%H2199><s%> O city; <S%H5892><s%> Melt <S%H4127><s%> away, O Philistia, <S%H6429><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you; For smoke <S%H6227><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> from the north, <S%H6828><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> straggler <S%H909><s%> in his ranks. <S%H4151><s%>

"How <S%H4100><s%> then will one answer <S%H6030><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of the nation <S%H1471><s%>? That the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has founded <S%H3245><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> And the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> of His people <S%H5971><s%> will seek <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in it."
